name: Niffelheim
description: Your avatar is a brave warrior who has fallen in battle. But instead of finding well-deserved peace in Asgard, his soul is trapped in the harsh world of Niffelheim. Survive in this hostile world, ransack the neighboring lands, explore dangerous dungeons and find your way to Valhalla.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newest Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris 4800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 4:3 and 21:9 screen ratio supported
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9XX or AMD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 4:3 and 21:9 screen ratio supported
